my_info.about: PDP Academy - Frontend Course. I have completed the Frontend Web Developer course at PDP Academy, where I gained a solid foundation in web development. I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks and libraries such as React, Node.js, and Express.js. I also gained practical experience by working on real-world projects and participating in group assignments.
my_info.title: I am a Frontend developer with half a year of experience. Below you can find more details about my work.
